description:
Tree works subject to a Tree Preservation Order.
Silver Lime: T14, T13, T11, T9, T7 - Clear 8 metres of the road, remove all dead wood, remove lower epicomic growth, clear 1m of the street lamp (387).
Silver Lime: T15, T12, T10, T8 - Remove small branches closer than 2.5m to the building, remove all dead wood, remove lower epicomic growth, clear 5m of the pavement.
Wingnut: T6, T2 - Remove small branches closer than 2.5m to the building, remove all dead wood, remove lower epidcomic growth, clear 5m of the pavement.
Wingnut: T5, T3 - Clear 8 metres of the road and 5 metres of the pavement, remove all dead wood, remove lower epicomic growth, remove small branches closer than 2.5m to the building.
Wingnut: T4 - Clear 8 metres of the road and 5 metres of the pavement, remove all dead wood, remove lower epicomic growth, clear 1m of the street lamp, remove small branches closer than 2.5m to the building, remove lower branch 10cm diameter.
Wingnut: T1 - Clear 8 meters of the road and 5 metres of the pavement, remove all dead wood, remove lower epicomic growth, clear 1m of the street lamp (387), remove low branch growing into the neighbour entrance.
Lime: T16, T17 - Clear 8 metres of the road, remove all dead wood, remove small branches closer than 2.5m to the building,.
Tree of heaven: T5, T3 - Clear 3 metres of the neighbour roof, remove all dead wood, remove small branches closer than 2.5m to the building.
